Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-21538 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-21538 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-2, affected by CVE-2024-21538
